original: HIC INCIPIT ORDINALE DE VITA SANCTI MEREADOCI

english: I am called Duke of Brittany,

modern: A'y linyeth pur wir yth ov,

original: Vn mab purwyr ʒyn y ma

english: A [One] son right truly we have,
I should like to exalt him
That he may be owner of countries.
Grammar, that he shall have soon,

original: yv ʒe voth mos a lemma
english: Is thy will to go hence,

modern: lavar dhyn ni, ow mab hweg?
english: Tell to us, my sweet son?
